posts.post_content:
Posted By: Marty
The price is below each card.  Price is out the door (shipping included).  Payment can be check money order, direct credit card or PayPal.  Sorry, but I am not interested in trades for Obak cards.

First I'll take it gets the card.  Requests for additional information will not hold the cards.  Email me at marty@martyspsagradedcards.com  put Obak in subject line.



[IMG]http://www.oldvintagebaseballcards.com/shop/images/obak%201.jpg[/IMG]
